name: HammerTime (s4shrish)
description:
(Recommended to play using Windows Executable for Linear color space usage, WebGL is Gamma color space)

It's a classic arcade experience of whacking what comes out of Holes, moles, in a virtual form.

Using a mouse to precisely aim the hammer across the board, the game can get progressively tougher and intense OR easier and slower paced depending on your combo (x2 etc) multiplier.
